text: Mein tum mein aur inn mein mazboot hijab bana deta hun. Mujhay lohay ki chadaren laa do. Yahan tak kay jab inn dono paharon kay darmiyan deewar barabar kerdi to hukum diya kay aag tez jalao ta-waqt-e-kay lohay ki inn chadaron ko bilkul aag ker diyato farmaya meray pass laao iss per pighla hua tanbaa daal doon
